(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (NP
        (NP (CD two) (NNS versions))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Curry) (NNP Fish) (NNP Head))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Singapore)))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, are-2)
num(versions-4, two-3)

prep(versions-4, of-5)
nn(Head-8, Curry-6)
nn(Head-8, Fish-7)
pobj(of-5, Head-8)
prep(Head-8, in-9)
pobj(in-9, Singapore-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP One))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ Chinese) (NN version))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (NN fish) (NN head))
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (VP (VBN steamed)
                  (ADVP (RB first))
                  (PP (IN before)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG cooking)
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT a) (NN curry))
                            (SBAR
                              (WHNP (WDT which))
                              (S
                                (VP (VBZ has)
                                  (NP
                                    (ADJP (RBR less) (JJ powdery))
                                    (NNS spices)))))))))))))
            (CC and)
            (S
              (NP (DT the) (JJ other))
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ Indian) (NN version))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHADVP (WRB where))
                    (S
                      (NP (DT the) (NN fish) (NN head))
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (VP (VBN cooked)
                          (NP
                            (NP (SYM a))
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP
                                (NP (NN pot))
                                (PP (IN of)
                                  (NP (JJ fiery) (NNS spices)))))
                            (SBAR
                              (WHNP (WDT that))
                              (S
                                (VP (VBZ is)
                                  (VP (VBN designed)
                                    (S
                                      (VP (TO to)
                                        (VP (VB make)
                                          (S
                                            (NP (PRP you))
                                            (VP (VB sweat)
                                              (ADVP (RB so) (RB that)))))))))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN thing))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (ADVP (RB really))
          (VP (VBD surprises)
            (NP (PRP me))
            (PP (IN about)
              (NP (NNP Karu) (POS 's)))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN fact))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD did) (RB n't)
            (VP (VB find)
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS curries))
              (PP (IN as)
                (ADJP (RB fiery) (JJ hot)))
              (SBAR (IN as)
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBD expected)))))))))
    (. .)))

prep(Closed-12, to-9)
amod(daily-11, 10pm-10)
pobj(to-9, daily-11)
root(ROOT-0, Closed-12)
prep(Closed-12, on-13)
pobj(on-13, Monday-14)
num(Monday-14, 67627284-15)

  (NP (NNP 83859511)))
